metadata.title: CVE-2018-16842 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Curl versions 7.14.1 through 7.61.1 are vulnerable to a heap-based bufferover-read in the tool_msgs.c:voutf() function that may result ininformation exposure and denial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-16842` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

curl - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.11
libcurl3 - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.11
libcurl3-gnutls - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.11
libcurl3-nss - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.11
No subscription required

criterions.comment: curl package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.47.0-1ubuntu2.11').
